# Label set (for issues/PRs)

Suggested labels to keep the improvement lane organized. Create in repo Settings â†’ Labels (or via API).

| Label        | Color   | Use |
|-------------|---------|-----|
| `security`  | red     | Security-related issues/opportunities |
| `perf`      | blue    | Performance improvements |
| `tech-debt` | gray    | Maintainability / refactors |
| `opportunity` | green | Filed from opportunities.md, not in current scope |
| `dependencies` | purple | Dependabot / dependency updates |
